description: RESS files are typically found accompanying ASSET files in the data folders of a game installation. You will most likely never come across a RESS file unless you are attempting to edit the resource files in the RESS file to modify gameplay. You can use Unity Assets Explorer and Unity Assets Bundle Extractor (version 2.1_b and later) to open RESS files.
NOTE: RESS files commonly appear with the ".resS" extension.
